title: Guntur Kaaram (Hindi)
short_cast: Mahesh Babu, Sreeleela, Meenakshi Chaudhary, Ramya Krishnan, Jayaram, Prakash Raj, Jagapathi Babu, Murli Sharma, Vennela Kishore
cast: Mahesh Babu, Sreeleela, Meenakshi Chaudhary, Ramya Krishnan, Jayaram, Prakash Raj, Jagapathi Babu, Murli Sharma, Vennela Kishore
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Years after his mother abandons him and remarries, a man demands answers when he's asked to sign a document denying he is her son as she runs for office.
